item.title: A Year of Growth: 13 Books That Transformed My Perspective in 2024
item.dc:creator: Anthony Faustine
item.description: In 2024, I embarked on a journey to read one book per month, resulting in 13 transformative reads. This post reflects on how these books shaped my perspective, covering themes like purpose-driven innovation (Build by Tony Fadell), intentional living (Essentialism by Greg McKeown), mindset shifts (The Magic of Thinking Big by David Schwartz), and resilience (Man’s Search for Meaning by Viktor Frankl). From leadership and negotiation to love and digital minimalism, each book offered unique insights, encouraging personal growth, empathy, and a focus on what truly matters. Join me as I share the lessons learned and their impact on my year.

item.title: The Lone Wolf vs. The Pack: Why Your Change Strategy Is Failing
item.dc:creator: Anthony Faustine
item.description: This post explores how Kurt Lewin’s theory of group dynamics reveals that lasting organizational change depends less on individual effort and more on engaging and transforming the collective forces within groups.
